title: Jim McMahon – 2021 Comments on Covid-19 at the DVLA in Swansea
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jim McMahon, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on 23 January 2021.
content:
It should be a source of shame for ministers that a government office has effectively become a Covid-19 superspreader, putting lives and livelihoods at risk.
